com.orchestranetworks.d3
Class D3Engine

java.lang.Object
  com.orchestranetworks.d3.D3Engine
public final class D3Engine
extends Object

Represents the external view of the D3 engine and offers administrative functionalities.

Method Detail

getFromSession

public static D3Engine getFromSession(Repository repository,
                                      Session aSession)
Gets a D3Engine from a repository and session.

Throws:
IllegalStateException - if called within a Batch or if not in master mode.

broadcast

public void broadcast(VersionKey snapshotKey)
               throws OperationException
Deprecated. Replaced by D3Broadcast.broadcast().

Asynchronously broadcasts a snapshot. This data space must be associated with a delivery profile.

Parameters:
snapshotKey - version to broadcast.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if:
  • snapshotKey is null
  • There is no AdaptationHome for snapshotKey
  • The snapshot is not valid
  • The parent data space of the snapshot is not a delivery data space
  • The delivery data space is not associated with a delivery profile
IllegalStateException - if called on a non-master node.
OperationException - if owner of the current session is not allowed to broadcast.

getBroadcastVersion

public VersionKey getBroadcastVersion(BranchKey dataSpaceKey)
Returns the broadcast snapshot if dataSpaceKey has been broadcast, otherwise returns null.

Parameters:
dataSpaceKey - D3 data space key
Throws:
IllegalStateException - if called on a non-master node or if dataSpaceKey is not a D3 data space.

getHandlerForSynchronousBroadcast

public D3Broadcast getHandlerForSynchronousBroadcast(VersionKey aSnapshotKey,
                                                     long aTimeOut)
Returns the synchronous broadcast handler in order to be used with the method D3Broadcast.broadcast().

Parameters:
aSnapshotKey - snapshot to be broadcast.
aTimeOut - if reached while broadcasting, an operation exception is thrown.
Since:
5.2.7

getHandlerForSynchronousBroadcast

public D3Broadcast getHandlerForSynchronousBroadcast(VersionKey aSnapshotKey)
Returns the synchronous broadcast handler in order to be used with the method D3Broadcast.broadcast(). The default timeout of the operation is set to 0 (unlimited).

Parameters:
aSnapshotKey - snapshot to be broadcast.
Since:
5.2.7

getHandlerForAsynchronousBroadcast

public D3Broadcast getHandlerForAsynchronousBroadcast(VersionKey aSnapshotKey)
Returns the asynchronous broadcast handler in order to be used with the method D3Broadcast.broadcast(). The timeout is not applicable in asynchronous mode.

Parameters:
aSnapshotKey - snapshot to be broadcast.
Since:
5.2.7

getD3SlaveFromId

public D3Slave getD3SlaveFromId(String aSlaveId)
Returns the slave for the specified identifier. If unknown to the master repository, it returns null.

Since:
5.2.7

getRegisteredSlaves

public List getRegisteredSlaves(BranchKey aDataSpaceKey)
Returns the list of the D3Slave object(s) subscribed to the data space specified in the parameter.

Parameters:
aDataSpaceKey - D3 data space key
Since:
5.2.7
